.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-Arrow-down {
    width: 21px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: 0 0;
}

.sprite-Arrow-down_scroll {
    width: 33px;
    height: 33px;
    background-position: -21px 0;
}

.sprite-Arrow-down_scroll_grey {
    width: 33px;
    height: 33px;
    background-position: -54px 0;
}

.sprite-Arrow-down_scroll_white {
    width: 33px;
    height: 33px;
    background-position: -87px 0;
}

.sprite-Arrow-right {
    width: 13px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -120px 0;
}

.sprite-Arrow-right-circle {
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -133px 0;
}

.sprite-footer__arrow-up {
    width: 17px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -149px 0;
}

.sprite-guidlines__arrow-right {
    width: 8px;
    height: 14px;
    background-position: -166px 0;
}
